song.title: Jesus Be The Center
song.lyrics:
[1] .A Bm A Jesus at the center of it all || .D A E Jesus at the center of it all || . D A From beginning to the end . E F#m E D It will always be, it's always been You || .Esus E Jesus, Jesus
[c] .A Nothing else matters .Bm A Nothing in this world will do || . A A/D Jesus You're the center .Bm F#m Everything revolves around You || . E Jesus, You ---
[2] .A Bm A Jesus be the center of my life, || .D A E Jesus be the center of my life, || . D A From beginning to the end . E It will always be, || . F#m E D E It's always been You, Jesus, Jesus
[B] . E From my heart to the heavens .F#m Jesus be the center . D It's all about you . E Yes its all about you
[3] .A Bm A/C# Jesus be the center of Your church || .D A E Jesus be the center of Your church || . D A And every knee will bow || . E F#m E And every tongue will confess you Jesus
